ghostPage.title: Home: What We Do
ghostPage.excerpt:

technologies that make up a decentralized social network. Both DSNP.org and

ghostPage.plaintext:
DSNP.org is an independent non-profit organization, focused on the Decentralized
Social Network Protocol (DSNP). The organization fits within the umbrella of 
Project Liberty [https://www.projectliberty.io/#/about] as the provider of one
core component (the social graph protocol) that connects the many different
technologies that make up a decentralized social network. Both DSNP.org and
Project Liberty have been launched out of Unfinished Labs
[https://www.unfinishedlabs.io/] as part of their efforts to build public
infrastructure for the web that puts citizens at the center of an innovative,
inclusive web economy.
ghostPage.html: DSNP.org is an independent non-profit organization, focused on the Decentralized Social Network Protocol (DSNP). The organization fits within the umbrella of Project Liberty as the provider of one core component (the social graph protocol) that connects the many different technologies that make up a decentralized social network. Both DSNP.org and Project Liberty have been launched out of Unfinished Labs as part of their efforts to build public infrastructure for the web that puts citizens at the center of an innovative, inclusive web economy.
